general_advisory: For paddy cultivation, always use certified seeds. Germination test is advisable before sowing. Use 24-30 kg of paddy seeds/acre for broadcasting and 12-16 kg seeds/acre for sowing by seed drill depending on the test weight of the seed. Incorporate the dhaincha green manuring crop at the time of initial puddling of the main field. Apply full dose of Phosphorus and Potash as per recommendations. Arhar can be grown as an intercrop in groundnut for more profit and soil health management. Treat okra seeds to provide resistance against pests. Ensure proper soil moisture before sowing. Preferably sow paddy seeds in line spacing using seed drill for optimal growth.

advisory: Incorporate dhaincha green manuring crop at the time of initial puddling of main field.
Apply full dose of Phosphorus and Potash as recommended.
Treat seeds to avoid Fall Army Worm infestation.
Use seed drill for sowing for optimal plant population.
Manage early shoot borer infestation by applying appropriate chemicals.
Plant seedlings at recommended distances and pit sizes.
Use disease-resistant and Tissue culture seedlings.
Ensure proper ventilation in poultry sheds.
Deworm and vaccinate poultry birds regularly.
